   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   28:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   29:      || (E) =/= (V)])).
   30: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   31: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   32: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     AuthMods = mongoose_helper:auth_modules(),
   40:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   41:         true ->
   42:             {skip, "Conf reload doesn't work correctly with sample external auth"};
   43:         _ ->
   44:             [{group, c2s_noproc}, %% should be first, uses vanilla config
   45:              {group, negative},
   46:              {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   47:              {group, starttls},
   48:              {group, feature_order},
   49:              {group, tls},
   50:              {group, ciphers_default},
   51:              {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}]
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: groups() ->
   55:     [{c2s_noproc, [], [reset_stream_noproc,
   56:                        starttls_noproc,
   57:                        compress_noproc]},
   58:      {negative, [], [bad_xml,
   59:                      invalid_host,
   60:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   61:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   62:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   63:      {feature_order, [stream_features_test,
   64:                       tls_authenticate,
   65:                       tls_compression_fail,
   66:                       tls_compression_authenticate_fail,
   67:                       tls_authenticate_compression,
   68:                       auth_compression_bind_session,
   69:                       auth_bind_compression_session]},
   70:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   71:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   72:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   73:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   74:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   75:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   76:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   77: 
   78: test_cases() ->
   79:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   80:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   81:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   82:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   83: 
   84: suite() ->
   85:     escalus:suite().
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Init & teardown
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: 
   91: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   93:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   94:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   95:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   96:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [?SECURE_USER, alice]}).
   97: 
   98: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [?SECURE_USER, alice]}),
  100:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
  101:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  102: 
  103: init_per_group(c2s_noproc, Config) ->
  104:     Config;
  105: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
  106:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
  107:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
  108:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  109:     Config;
  110: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
  111:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  112:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  113:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
  114:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
  115:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  116:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  117:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  118: init_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  119:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern/0),
  120:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  121:     Config;
  122: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  123:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  124:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  125:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  126: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  127:      node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
  128:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  129: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  130:     Config.
  131: 
  132: end_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  133:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
  134:     Config;
  135: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  136:     Config.
  137: 
  138: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  139:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  140:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  141: 
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: %% Tests
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: 
  146: bad_xml(Config) ->
  147:     %% given
  148:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  149:     %% when
  150:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  151:     %% then
  152:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  153:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  154:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  155:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  156:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  157: 
  158: invalid_host(Config) ->
  159:     %% given
  160:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  161:     %% when
  162:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  163:     %% then
  164:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  165:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  166:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  167:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  168:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  169: 
  170: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  171:     %% given
  172:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  173:     %% when
  174:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  175:     %% then
  176:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  177:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  178:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  179: 
  180: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  181:     %% given
  182:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  183:     Steps = [
  184:              %% when
  185:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  186:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  187:             ],
  188:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  189:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  190:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  191: 
  192: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  193:     %% GIVEN
  194:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  195:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  196:     %% WHEN
  197:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  198:     %% THEN
  199:         _ ->
  200:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  201:     catch
  202:         error:closed ->
  203:             ok
  204:     end.
  205: 
  206: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  207:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  208: 
  209: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  210:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  211: 
  212: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  213:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  214: 
  215: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  216:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  217:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  218: 
  219:     %% WHEN
  220:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  221: 
  222:     %% THEN
  223:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  224: 
  225: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  226:     %% GIVEN
  227:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  228:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  229: 
  230:     %% WHEN
  231:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  232:     %% THEN
  233:         _ ->
  234:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  235:     catch
  236:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  237:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  238:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  239:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  240:                            AuthReply)
  241:     end.
  242: 
  243: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  244:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  245:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  246:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  247:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  248:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  249:     end,
  250:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  251:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  252:                  Features).
  253: 
  254: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  255:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  256: 
  257: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  258:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  259:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  260: 
  261: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  262:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  263:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  264: 
  265: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  266:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  267:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  268: 
  269: 
  270: reset_stream_noproc(Config) ->
  271:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  272:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  273:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  274:                end,
  275:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  276:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  277: 
  278:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  279:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  280:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  281:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  282:     %% Add auth element into message queue of the c2s process
  283:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  284:     ?assertThrow({timeout, auth_reply}, escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props)),
  285:     %% Sim client disconnection
  286:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  287:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  288:     %% Resume
  289:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  290:     receive
  291:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  292:             ok;
  293:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  294:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  295:         after 5000 ->
  296:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  297:     end,
  298:     ok.
  299: 
  300: starttls_noproc(Config) ->
  301:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  302:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  303:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  304:                end,
  305:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  306:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  307: 
  308:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  309:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  310:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  311:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  312:     %% Add starttls element into message queue of the c2s process
  313:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  314:     ?assertThrow({timeout, proceed}, escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props)),
  315:     %% Sim client disconnection
  316:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  317:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  318:     %% Resume
  319:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  320:     receive
  321:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  322:             ok;
  323:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  324:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  325:         after 5000 ->
  326:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  327:     end,
  328:     ok.
  329: 
  330: compress_noproc(Config) ->
  331:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  332:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  333:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  334:                end,
  335:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  336:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  337: 
  338:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  339:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  340:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  341:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  342:     %% Add compress element into message queue of the c2s process
  343:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  344:     ?assertThrow({timeout, compressed},
  345:                  escalus_session:compress(Conn, [{compression, <<"zlib">>}|Props])),
  346:     %% Sim client disconnection
  347:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  348:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  349:     %% Resume
  350:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  351:     receive
  352:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  353:             ok;
  354:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  355:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  356:         after 5000 ->
  357:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  358:     end,
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  362: %% Internal functions
  363: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  364: 
  365: c2s_port(Config) ->
  366:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  367:         undefined -> 5223;
  368:         Value -> Value
  369:     end.
  370: 
  371: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  372:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  373:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  374: 
  375: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  376:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  377:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  378:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  379:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  380: 
  381: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  382:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  383:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  384:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  385:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  386:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  387: 
  388: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  389:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  390:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  391: 
  392: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  393:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  394:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  395: 
  396: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  397:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  398: 
  399: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  400:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  401: 
  402: mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern() ->
  403:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,  {zlib, 10000},"}.
  404: 
  405: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  406:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  407: 
  408: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  409:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  410: 
  411: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  412:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  413:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  414:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  415:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  416: 
  417: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  418:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  419:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  420: 
  421: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  422:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  423:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  424:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  425: 
  426: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  427:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  428:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  429: 
  430: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  431:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  432:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  433: 
  434: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  435:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  436:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  437:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  438:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  439:         end,
  440:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  441:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  442: 
  443: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  444:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  445:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  446: 
  447: default_context(To) ->
  448:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  449:      {to, To},
  450:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  451: 
  452: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  453:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  454:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
  455: 
  456: 
  457: %% Tests featuress advertisement
  458: stream_features_test(Config) ->
  459:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  460:     List = [start_stream, stream_features, {?MODULE, verify_features}],
  461:     escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, List),
  462:     ok.
  463: 
  464: verify_features(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  465:     %% should not advertise compression before tls because tls is `required`
  466:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features)),
  467:     %% start tls. Starttls should be then removed from list and compression should be added
  468:     {Conn1, Props1} = escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props),
  469:     {Conn2, Props2, Features2} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn1, Props1, []),
  470:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features2)),
  471:     ?assert(false =/= has_feature(compression, Features2)),
  472: 
  473:     %% Authenticate. Feature list should not be changed (`mechanisms` should be removed but we dont need to check it)
  474:     {Conn3, Props3, _}  =     escalus_session:authenticate(Conn2, Props2, Features2),
  475:     {Conn4, Props4, Features4} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn3, Props3, []),
  476:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features4)),
  477:     ?assert(false =/= has_feature(compression, Features4)),
  478: 
  479:     %% start compression. Compression should be then removed from list
  480:     {Conn5, Props5} = escalus_session:compress(Conn4, Props4),
  481:     {_, _, Features6} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn5, Props5, []),
  482:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features6)),
  483:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features6)).
  484:     %%
  485: 
  486: has_feature(Feature, FeatureList) ->
  487:     {_, Value} = lists:keyfind(Feature, 1, FeatureList),
  488:     Value.
  489: 
  490: %% tests for different order feature negotiation
  491: %% should fail
  492: tls_compression_authenticate_fail(Config) ->
  493:     %% Given
  494:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  495:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression, authenticate],
  496:     %% when and then
  497:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  498:         _ ->
  499:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  500:     catch
  501:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  502:             case Stanza of
  503:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  504:                     ok;
  505:                 _ ->
  506:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  507:             end
  508:     end.
  509: 
  510: tls_authenticate_compression(Config) ->
  511:     %% Given
  512:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  513:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate, maybe_use_compression],
  514:     %% then
  515:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  516:     % when and then
  517:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  518:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  519:     ?assert(false =/= Compress),
  520:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  521: 
  522: tls_authenticate(Config) ->
  523:     %% Given
  524:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  525:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate],
  526:     %% then
  527:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  528:     % when,
  529:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  530:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  531: 
  532: %% should fail
  533: tls_compression_fail(Config) ->
  534:     %% Given
  535:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  536:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression],
  537:     %% then and when
  538:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  539:         _ ->
  540:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  541:     catch
  542:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  543:             case Stanza of
  544:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  545:                     ok;
  546:                 _ ->
  547:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  548:             end
  549:     end.
  550: 
  551: auth_compression_bind_session(Config) ->
  552:     %% Given
  553:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  554:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  555:                         authenticate, maybe_use_compression, bind, session],
  556:     %% then
  557:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  558:     % when
  559:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  560:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  561: 
  562: auth_bind_compression_session(Config) ->
  563:     %% Given
  564:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  565:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  566:                         authenticate, bind, maybe_use_compression, session],
  567:     %% then
  568:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  569:     % when
  570:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  571:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  572: 
  573: %% Helpers
  574: children_specs_to_pids(Children) ->
  575:     [Pid || {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children].
